summary: Completed testing of JodiFy music player login functionality and initial UI elements. Login with admin/admin123 works correctly and main app loads. Identified critical issue with profile modal not opening due to CSS class handling.

ui_bugs.issue: Profile modal does not open when profile button is clicked - modal exists but .open class is not being added correctly
ui_bugs.details: Modal uses CSS class .open for visibility but JavaScript openProfileModal() function may not be executing properly

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access profile statistics (Likes, Played, Downloads) due to modal not opening
Cannot test Discord link functionality as it's inside the non-opening profile modal
Cannot test community features as community button is inside profile modal

design_issues.issue: Offline modal appears immediately after login and blocks interactions
design_issues.details: Modal shows 'Sin conexi√≥n detectada' even when online, requires manual dismissal

passed_tests: Login form loads correctly with proper data-testid attributes
Username and password inputs accept admin/admin123 credentials
Main app loads after successful login
Login screen is properly hidden after login
Profile button exists and is clickable
All required HTML elements present (profile-modal, discord-link-modal, community-modal)
CSS classes for modal visibility are properly defined
Backend static file serving works correctly (100% success rate)
Offline modal can be dismissed with 'Reintentar' button
Application structure supports all required features
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix profile modal opening functionality. The openProfileModal() function exists but the modal does not receive the .open CSS class when profile button is clicked. This blocks access to all profile features including Discord integration, user statistics, and community access. Check JavaScript event binding and modal state management.
success_percentage: Backend: 100%, Frontend: 40% - Login works but profile modal blocking access to main features
